response.original_title: HONG KONG: Forging an Unbreakable Bond
response.overview: Right after Hong Kong's return, an unprecedented financial crisis swept across Asia.  With international speculators "hunting" around, stock markets were collapsing and currencies falling sharply.  In retrospect, many believe the central government offered the right amount of support to Hong Kong.
response.title: HONG KONG: Forging an Unbreakable Bond
